title: LittleLemon
desc: A web app for the customers of a fictional restaurant that enables them to view the menu on offer and reserve a table

title: World News Search
desc: A news search service that allows users to see local news and country info when searching by country

title: Littlelemon API
desc: Simple REST API that serves as the backend of a fictional restaurant and allow users of the app to perform different CRUD operations via HTTP requests to different endpoints.

title: README Generator
desc: This is a node.js application that enables developers to quickly generate a README file thereby saving them time for other development activities.

title: Littlelemon mobile app
desc: A mobile application built with react native that allows customers of a fictional restaurant to order food via the app.

title: Shopping App
desc: An ecommerce website which retrieves data from the backend, users are able to search for specific products, view details of the products and add products to cart

title: Team Profile Generator
desc: This is a command line application that takes user input and generates an html page based on that input.
